mapper.select: select user_id as userId, order_time as orderTime, start_hour as startHour, end_hour as endHour, service_tag as serviceTag, tag_text as tagText, price,game, order_state as orderState, recommendation,service_text as serviceText from t_funtime_order where user_id = #{userId} and order_state = 1
select id,tag_name as tagName,tag_color as tagColor,tag_url as tagUrl from t_funtime_tag where tag_type = 'order' and FIND_IN_SET(id,#{serviceTag})>0 order by sort

select d.user_id as userId,d.service_text as serviceText,unix_timestamp(d.create_time) createTime,d.tag_text tagText, d.price,d.game, u.nickname,u.portrait_address as portraitAddress,u.sex, (select GROUP_CONCAT(g.tag_name,'/',ifnull(g.id,'')) from t_funtime_tag g where g.tag_type = 'order' and FIND_IN_SET(g.id,d.service_tag)>0 ) as tags from t_funtime_order d inner join t_funtime_user u on d.user_id = u.id where d.order_state = 1
and d.create_time < from_unixtime(#{lastId})
and FIND_IN_SET(#{tagId},d.service_tag)>0
order by d.create_time desc limit ${counts}

select d.user_id as userId, d.price, u.nickname,u.portrait_address as portraitAddress,u.sex,c.room_id as roomId, case when h.user_id is null then null when h.type = 1 then f.level_url when h.type = 2 then (select w.headwear_url from t_funtime_headwear w where w.headwear_number = h.headwear_id limit 1) else null end levelUrl from t_funtime_order d inner join t_funtime_user u on d.user_id = u.id inner join (t_funtime_user_account a inner join t_funtime_user_level_conf f on a.level = f.level) on d.user_id = a.user_id left join t_funtime_user_headwear_current h on u.id = h.user_id left join t_funtime_chatroom_mic c on d.user_id = c.mic_user_id and u.online_state = 1 where d.order_state = 1 and recommendation = 1
and FIND_IN_SET(#{tagId},d.service_tag)>0
order by d.create_time desc limit 3
mapper.update:
update t_funtime_order
order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_hour = #{startHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_hour = #{endHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_tag = #{serviceTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tag_text = #{tagText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
game = #{game,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price},
order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recommendation = #{recommendation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
service_text = #{serviceText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select d.id,d.order_no as orderNo,d.poundage,d.tag_name as tagName,d.price,d.counts,d.total_red as totalRed,d.state ,d.remark,d.reason as reason,DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime ,u.sex,u.portrait_address as portraitAddress,u.nickname from t_funtime_user_order_record d inner join t_funtime_user u on d.user_id = u.id where d.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_funtime_user_order_record (order_no, user_id, to_user_id, price, price_amount, tag_name, counts, poundage,total,total_red, remark, state,reason, order_taking_time, complete_time, to_complete_time) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{toUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{counts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{poundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{total},#{totalRed}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{reason}, #{orderTakingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{toCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update t_funtime_user_order_record
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reason = #{reason},
order_taking_time = #{orderTakingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
complete_time = #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
to_complete_time = #{toCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
